channel.title: Superman & Lois on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Superman & Lois on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Box Office: ‘Bad Guys 2’ Scores $2.6M in Previews, Liam Neeson’s ‘Naked Gun’ Loads Up With $1.6M
item.description: The two films — along with Neon’s gruesome horror-comedy ‘Together’ — are going up against holdovers ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ and ‘Superman’ at the early August box office.
